newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RUGBY UNION-NEW ZEALAND BEAT SOUTH AFRICA 55-35.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-NEW ZEALAND BEAT SOUTH AFRICA 55-35.

text.p: New Zealand beat South Africa 55-35 (halftime 23-21) in a Tri-Nations test at Eden Park on Saturday.
New Zealand - Tries: Alama Ieremia, Carlos Spencer, Christian Cullen (2), Justin Marshall, Taine Randell, Tana Umaga. Conversions: Spencer (4). Penalties: Spencer (4).
South Africa - Tries: Ruben Kruger, Gary Teichmann, Percy Montgomery, Joost van der Westhuizen, Pieter Rossouw. Conversions: Jannie de Beer (3), Henry Honiball (2).
